title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama project: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with a simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers via a lightweight fetch wrapper.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG and admin controls.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous & asynchronous APIs, streaming, and Kotlin coroutines support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: A Go CLI that wraps Ollama’s REST API to chat, pull, list, delete and benchmark models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat panel.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo showing how to build a RAG pipeline with Ollama embeddings, Chroma vector store and LangChain.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support, PVCs and autoscaling.

title: ollama-nvidia-trt
summary: Experimental TensorRT-LLM backend for Ollama to accelerate inference on NVIDIA GPUs with low latency.

title: ollama-distroless
summary: Minimal distroless Docker images for Ollama that shrink image size by ~70 % and reduce attack surface.

title: ollama-telegram-bot
summary: Self-hosted Telegram bot that chats with any Ollama model, supports group chats, system prompts and streaming.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes for building local NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with strong typing, IAsyncEnumerable streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama using reqwest and tokio; includes CLI example and Axum webserver template.

title: ollama-model-mirror
summary: Tool to mirror Ollama’s official model library to your private registry or S3 bucket for air-gapped deployments.

title: ollama-express-starter
summary: Boilerplate for building REST APIs with Node.js, Express and Ollama; includes Docker, tests and OpenAPI docs.

title: ollama-streamlit-chat
summary: Streamlit chat UI that connects to Ollama with session memory, markdown rendering and voice input via browser.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot bringing Ollama models to Discord servers with slash commands, moderation and per-guild model configs.
